title: An App That's the Best of Both Worlds
excerpt: This application demonstrates the power of modern web frameworks by seamlessly blending server-side rendering and client-side interactivity. We use Server Components for fast, secure data fetching and Client Components for a rich, responsive user experience.

title: How Comments and Likes Work
excerpt: Explore two different approaches to interactivity. The comment feature uses a Server Action, allowing the form to directly call a secure function on the server. The likes button, however, uses a traditional client-side API call to update the count without a full page refresh.
